text: Won W. Lee is a professor of religion and Asian studies and department chair at Calvin University in Grand Rapids, Michigan.. == Life == Lee holds a BA from Yonsei University, Korea, a M.Div from the Princeton Theological Seminary, and from 1998 a PhD from the Claremont Graduate School, He is a member of Society of Biblical Literature, The Society for Old Testament Study and Korean Biblical Colloquium. == Works == * * * * * * * * ==References == Category:Living people
title: Won W. Lee
